Articles.Content:
The goal of this challenge is to make a rover as small a possible,land it on Eello and drive it to the Eello`s north pole (no lendind on the Eello`s north pole you must drive a rover to it the rover must contain all following parts: seismometer,thermometer,gravimeter,barometer,ground sampler(the ore ammount testing instrument from sience tab),bettery, solar panels or those reactor thingy`s.

RULES

1. MODS allowed:TAC life support,remote tech,all procedural part mods,all visual mods.all other mods are forrbiden from using

2.NO BUG EXSPLOITS

 

BONUSES

1. manned +10 points

2. more than two kerbals +25

3.rover can fit inside a 1.25M fairing(wighout any rover pats sticking out)+20

4.SSTO delivery to Eello +30

 

TO complete the challenge post both pictures and videos of the mission down on the replies

 

GOOD LUCK!!!!!!!          djura95

Edited January 16, 2016 by djura95
Bad idea to put your email address in a forum post...you will get a world of spam as well hacking attempts on your email account.
